how do i do these on CLI?
Be sure you don't delete the newest kernel, nor the one you're on (uname -a will tell you that).  Also, for an upgrade, they should be the same.
apt-get purge package1 package2 package3 etc
to find the packages, dpkg -l | grep linux-image
